snippet.title: "Amber vs Amber" by Ellen Von Unwerth for Vs. mag
snippet.description:
Complex is a word that Heard uses repeatedly to describe the roles she’s attracted to. She makes that clear in this short film by Ellen von Unwerth, depicting a dreamer with dueling personalities – one masculine, one feminine, both outrageously sexy…

snippet.title: Traíler Red Band de London Fields | Los desnudos de Amber Heard
snippet.description:
Más de el filme aquí: https://www.cinematte.com.es/2017/04/el-falso-desnudo-de-amber-heard-en.html

Para muchos es la película más esperada del año; para otros estamos ante lo que va a ser el mayor fiasco de 2018, el caso es Lionsgate ha lanzado ya el tráiler de 'London Fields', adaptación de la novela homónima de Martin Amis cuya premiere mundial tuvo lugar en el Festival Internacional de Cine de Toronto... de 2015 y aún no ha visto la luz...





Según cuenta la leyenda, la película fue masacrada sin piedad por los allí presentes. Después de aquel "golpe mortal" el director, el debutante Mathew Cullen, demandó a los productores por haber metido mano en el montaje de la película sin su consentimiento... y la misma desapareció del mapa.
snippet.channelTitle: Videoclub Online CINEMATTE FLIX y Revista de Cine

snippet.title: Amber Heard incanta Venezia
snippet.description: Amber Heard, la bellissima moglie di Johnny Depp incanta Venezia. Sorridente e radiosa avvolta in un abito chiaro floreale Amber è arrivata al Lido di Venezia per il photocall del film “The Danish Girl” ed è stata accolta da una grande folla di fan tutti desiderosi di selfie e autografi. Non è la protagonista del film ma tutti i flash sono per lei Amber, è lei la più desiderata anche in laguna….....ha stregato proprio tutti non solo Johnny Depp !!! www.newimagesmagazine.it

snippet.title: Amber Heard Talks Life After Marrying Johnny Depp!
snippet.description:
Please watch: "Milano Fashion Week - CAVALLI SHOW SS2017" 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0fMJIwEsYsk
-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-

Amber Heard Talks Life After Marrying Johnny Depp!

Amber Heard shows off her svelte figure on the cover of Elle magazine’s July 2015 issue, on newsstands June 23.

Here’s what the 29-year-old actress had to share with the mag:

On life since marrying Johnny Depp: “Nothing is a dramatic change. We’ve been together for a long time now, so it’s been a fairly organic process. I have a fiercely independent spirit.”

On fame: “The thing that really scares me is the potential of losing my freedom. I never want for my life to lose the ability to transverse the world, with freedom and ease. The freedom and ease I have worked so hard to acquire for myself.”
snippet.tags: ['Amber Heard', 'Johnny Depp', 'svelte figure', 'Elle magazine', 'Drama (TV Genre)', 'Pirates', 'Jack', 'Caribbean', 'Sparrow', 'Life', 'Second', 'John Berry (film Director)', 'Captain', 'Captain (Job Title)']
